remarks:
A complex number can be expressed in terms of two reals.  Definition 10-1.1(v) of [Gleason] p. 130.  Axiom 17 of 22 for real and complex numbers, derived from ZF set theory.  This construction-dependent theorem should not be referenced directly; instead, use ~ ax-cnre . (Contributed by NM, 13-May-1996.)  (New usage is discouraged.) 

---

 A complex number can be expressed in terms of two reals.  Definition 10-1.1(v) of [Gleason] p. 130.  Axiom for real and complex numbers, derived from set theory.  This construction-dependent theorem should not be referenced directly; instead, use ~ ax-cnre .  (Contributed by NM, 13-May-1996.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
axcnre $p |- ( A e. CC -> E. x e. RR E. y e. RR A = ( x + ( _i x. y ) ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
